backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing site ownership and order CRUD with admin-only access checks and stable storage for orders and owner principal.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for updating admin-route gating UX.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project structure.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router setup defining public and admin routes, wrapping admin pages with AdminRouteGuard.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard handling login prompts, owner-claiming flow, and admin authorization checks before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Bitcoin: Checkout UI component showing BTC payment details with copy-to-clipboard helpers and order metadata.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, navigation, footer, and admin link logic based on identity and admin status.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Denom: Displays denomination selection cards using BTC/USDT rate data and highlights the selected option.
Shows a callout card displaying the min and max supported USDT denominations.
Dropdown selector for choosing a specific USDT denomination from supported values.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Quant: Provides buttons and input to adjust quantity within min/max limits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBtcUsdtRate.ts: Fetches and caches the BTC/USDT rate with fallback logic and exposes rate state for UI usage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating order and admin-related data via the backend actor, including creation and status updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including Binance-themed color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Displays detailed admin view of a single order with status update controls and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Shows a table of all orders for admins with status badges and navigation to individual order pages.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Renders product catalog UI allowing users to choose denomination and quantity before saving to cart and moving to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles order creation with user input, BTC payment calculation, error handling, and success snapshot display.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero banner, feature highlights, and navigation to catalog and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/OrderStatusPage.tsx: Fetches and displays the status of a specific order with BTC/USDT info, badges, and error or loading states.
frontend/src/state/cartSession.ts: Manages saving, loading, and clearing cart session data in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/denominations.ts: Exports a list of supported gift card denominations.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Provides utilities to format and map errors into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/pricing.ts: Handles pricing calculations including discounts and BTC/USDT conversions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, fonts, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for a Binance Gift Card sales website using BTC payments. Highlights checkout bugs, BTC conversion issues, and admin access problems.
